content: You may now go ahead. Specific to R&D, sales and marketing, maybe G&A, in the near-term, there are some continuing additions to the teams that we're making principally in research and development as we continue to ramp the teams for innovation, but certainly the levels of growth we've experienced over the past four quarters are curtailing and you won't see that continued level of increase. You may now go ahead. You may now go ahead. You may now go ahead. You may now go ahead. You may now go ahead.
